about_the_game:
Space Trucking

Cattle Hyperdrive is a space trucking open world game that takes place across the solar system. Fly between on-planet and space destinations with containers in tow. Step out of your ship and interact with locals. Maneuver through space debris while traveling FTL. Engage in the narrative story line, or just complete side missions. Plan trade routes and earn high profits on investments.

The Ship

The game features a physics based ship that interacts with the environment. The ship can enter a warp state for long distance travel, but watch out for asteroid fields. Use the hitch mechanism to attach containers for space trucking delivery.

Space Legs

Hop out of the ship and stretch out your legs. Talk to the locals to unlock side missions and discover the lore. Complete side missions and deliveries to earn money. Find all the easter eggs.
